mapper.select: select distinct sd.dept_id, sd.dept_code, sd.parent_id, sd.ancestors, sd.dept_name, sd.order_num, sd.leader, sd.phone, sd.email, sd.status, sd.del_flag, sd.create_by, sd.create_time from sys_sub_admin_dept suad left join sys_dept sd on suad.dept_id = sd.dept_id where sd.del_flag = '2' and suad.user_id = #{userId}

insert.foreach: insert into sys_sub_admin_dept ( user_id, dept_id, create_by, create_time ) select #{item.userId}, #{item.deptId}, #{item.createBy}, sysdate() from dual where not exists(select user_id, dept_id from sys_sub_admin_dept where concat(user_id, dept_id) = concat(#{item.userId}, #{item.deptId}))

mapper.delete:
delete from sys_sub_admin_dept where concat(user_id, dept_id) in
concat(#{item.userId, item.deptId})
